giro.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a cheque paid by the government to someone who is unemployed
giro.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a system of banking in Britain in which a central computer can send money from one bank account to another electronically
giro.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: in Britain and some other countries, a system for sending money electronically from one bank account to another
giro.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: You can pay your gas bill by giro.
